mapper.select: (SELECT * FROM apply WHERE to_user=#{from} AND STATUS=#{status} ORDER BY apply_date DESC) UNION ( SELECT * FROM apply WHERE from_user=#{from} AND STATUS=#{status} ORDER BY apply_date DESC)
SELECT * FROM apply WHERE STATUS =#{status} AND from_user=#{from} GROUP BY to_user ORDER BY apply_date DESC LIMIT 0,5
SELECT IF(COUNT(1)=0,0,id) COUNT FROM apply WHERE from_user =#{from} AND to_user =#{to} AND STATUS =#{status} LIMIT 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM `apply` WHERE ((`from_user`=#{from} AND `to_user`=#{to} ) || (`from_user`=#{to} AND `to_user`=#{from} )) AND STATUS=1
